document.full_text: xerox corp  said it would increase its sales of hardware and business services as much as 8 percent by 2012, which sent its shares higher in premarket trading on tuesday.
document.title: xerox raises sales targets, shares rise
lines_and_colors: xerox corp  said it would increase its sales of hardware and business services as much as 8 percent by 2012, which sent its shares higher in premarket trading on tuesday.
